name: Off Road Rumble
description:
60% OFF Sale!!! Get it now!
Have a blast racing and smashing your way to first place with this fast paced free style game. Really three games for the price of one. 1) A short race through the Sierra Nevada Foothills. 2) A long endurance race in the desert. 3) Rumble Island where the goal is to demolish the other players and be the last one standing. All games have a high degree of realism and fun due to high level of physics integration.

Perfect party game for two or four players.

Features:
• Mesh deforming
• Realtime shadows
• Perfect party game
• Multiplayer (1 - 4 players)
• High level Physics
• Supports various gamepads.

Gamepads recommended for optimal control.
